member.name: T:SySal.Executables.ASCII2TLG.Exe
member.summary: Converts an ASCII file of n-tuples to a TLG file.

remarks.para: The n-tuples must be in the format: pts areasum px py sx sy sigma

Usage example (command line):
ASCII2TLG.exe c:\myfile.txt c:\myfile.tlg

member.name: M:SySal.Executables.ASCII2TLG.Exe.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.
